projects.name: Meteo Score
projects.description: How accurate are weather forecasts? Find out here.

projects.name: Quickr
projects.description: Shorten URLs, track clicks, find your links fast.

projects.name: Quickr Jump
projects.description: Jump to your short URLs from the browser address bar.
